description: this template creates a drop-down list
html:
<!-- 
to use the template we can create a datasource with a query like this:
select distinct (Restaurant.borough) as borough from Restaurants as c
When we use the template, the parameters can be filled, for example, as follows:
SIGNALNAME, name of the signal that the gadget emits, we write borough
PARAMETER-FROMDATASOURCE-VALUE, we select the datasource borough parameter that would be the value that is sent.
PARAMETER-FROMDATASOURCE-LABEL, we select the datasource borough parameter that would be the label that is shown.-->




<md-input-container style="margin:0;padding:0;width:100%">
  <md-select ng-change="sendFilter('<!--label-osp  name="signalName" type="text"-->',c)" ng-model="c">
    <md-option ng-value="inst.<!--label-osp  name="parameter-fromDataSource-value" type="ds_parameter"--> " ng-repeat='inst in ds' >
    {{inst.<!--label-osp  name="parameter-fromDataSource-label" type="ds_parameter"-->}}
    </md-option>
  </md-select>
</md-input-container>
